sentences.cn: 一个个子矮小、皮肤黝黑的男人

sentences.en: According to tradition, His face was swarthy and His hair was of a chestnut color.
sentences.cn: 根据传统, 他的脸是黝黑的并且他的头发有一种粟子颜色.

sentences.en: Do not stare at me because I am swarthy, For the sun has burned me.
sentences.cn: 歌1:6不要因日头把我晒黑了 、 就轻看我.

sentences.en: He had a broad swarthy face.
Koreans and Chinese, on the other hand, are depicted as swarthy, brutish and slit - eyed.
sentences.cn: 而韩国人和中国人的形象则是黑皮肤, 小眼睛而且粗野不堪.

sentences.en: Our driver strolled up, huge and swarthy.
sentences.cn: 我们的司机悠闲地走了过来，他身材高大，肤色黝黑。

sentences.en: Scarlett felt that she would strangle at the expression on Captain Butler's swarthy piratical face.
sentences.cn: 看着巴特勒船长那张海盗般黝黑的脸上的表情,思嘉只觉得自己快要给闷死了.

sentences.en: She was tall , slim, rather swarthy, with large saucy eyes.
sentences.cn: 她瘦高个, 皮肤黝黑, 有一双漂亮的大眼睛.

sentences.en: The face was saturnine and swarthy, and the sensual lips seemed to be twisted with disdain.
sentences.cn: 他皮肤黝黑, 面带讥讽表情,嘴里叼着烟斗,是个鞑靼人.

sentences.en: There were women of the cattle camps, and swarthy cigarette - smoking women of Old Mexico.
sentences.cn: 还有游牧营他的妇女, 老墨西哥抽烟的黧黑的妇女.

trans.tran_en: someone who is swarthy has dark skin
